variables.title: es_index_name
variables.description: You MUST set this to your Elasticsearch index name.

variables.title: es_knn_body
variables.description: PLEASE EDIT ON "Utils - Search WxD" ACTION

variables.title: model_id
variables.description: The ID of the model to be used for this user prompt.

variables.title: model_parameters_decoding_method
variables.description: The strategy used for picking the tokens during generation of the output text.

variables.title: model_parameters_include_stop_sequence
variables.description: The value to control presence of matched stop sequences from the end of the output text.

variables.title: model_parameters_max_new_tokens
variables.description: The maximum number of new tokens to be generated.

variables.title: model_parameters_min_new_tokens
variables.description: The minimum number of new tokens to be generated.

variables.title: model_parameters_random_seed
variables.description: A random number generator seed to use in sampling mode for experimental repeatability.

variables.title: model_parameters_repetition_penalty
variables.description: The penalty for penalizing tokens that have already been generated or belong to the context.

variables.title: model_parameters_stop_sequences
variables.description: The strings which will cause the text generation to stop if/when they are produced as part of the output. Stop sequences encountered prior to the minimum number of tokens being generated will be ignored.

variables.title: model_parameters_temperature
variables.description: The value used to control the next token probabilities. The range is from 0.05 to 1.00; 0.05 makes it mostly deterministic.

variables.title: model_parameters_time_limit
variables.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait before stopping generation. The text generated so far will be returned along with the TIME_LIMIT stop reason.

variables.title: model_parameters_top_k
variables.description: The number of highest probability vocabulary tokens to keep for top-k-filtering.

variables.title: model_parameters_top_p
variables.description: Similar to top_k except the candidates to generate the next token are the most likely tokens with probabilities that add up to at least top_p.

variables.title: model_response
variables.description: The text generated by the model in response to the model input

variables.title: es_query_body
variables.description: PLEASE EDIT ON "Utils - Search WxD" ACTION

variables.title: watsonx_api_version
variables.description: The version of the watsonx api (required)
